bill.summary: 3/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Water Supply Act of 1958 to allow the Chief of Engineers of the Army Corps of Engineers to borrow funds from the Federal Financing Bank to finance capital improvements at the Washington Aqueduct. Requires loan repayment by Aqueduct users.
